descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Pajiman Follower[/b][/size]

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63085/?][b]Pajiman[/b][/url] for sharing his cute char preset

[center]

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/63317-1-1425352809.jpg[/img]

From left to right: Alice, Touko, Parvati, MsToilet[/center]

[b]Charstat:[/b]
[size=2]
[font=Courier New]
Name_____/ Voice_______/ class_________/ combatstyle________/ weapon___________/ perk/skill_/ Pack+DefArmor
Alice____/ Youngeager__/ dremoramele___/ cshumanboss1h______/ ebony sword______/ onehand____/ Brenuin
Touko____/ Commander___/ dremoramele___/ cshumanboss2h______/ ebony greatsword_/ twohand____/ JonBattle
Parvati__/ Youngeager__/ draugmissile__/ csMercerFreyRanged_/ ebony bow+arrow__/ archer_____/ Olfina
MsToilet_/ Eventoned___/ dremoramele___/ csThalmorMeleeDual_/ ebony sword______/ onehand____/ Ysolda

onehand_: Armsman 2, Bladesman 2, Savage Strike, Dual Flurry 1
twohand_: Barbarian 2, Champions Stance, Great Critical Charge, Devastating Blow, Deep Wounds
archer__: overdraw 2, Critical Shot 1, Hunters Discipline, Ranger, Eagle Eye, Quick Shot, Steady Hand 1

applied to all follower:
blockPerk____: Shield Wall 2, Power Bash, Elemental Protection, Block Runner, Shield Charge
HealingPerk__: Novice Restoration, Apprentice Restoration, Recovery 1, Regeneration
HealingSpell_: Fast Healing, Heal Other
AlterPerk____: Novice Alteration, Apprentice Alteration, Magic Resistance 1
AlterSpell___: Oakflesh
Aggression___: Aggressive
Confidence___: Foolhardy
Crime________: Any
Assist_______: FriendAlly
minLevel_____: 3
maxLevel_____: 200
Location_____: Whiterunbanneredmare + depending hour @ each PackageAi
[/font][/size]
